thread.section_title: Proven Data Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Proven Data | provendatarecovery.com
thread.title: Mohammad

author: Mohammad
title: Mohammad
text:
We had our server hacked and all our Data including the backups was crypted by DMA V3.0
Before we decided to pay the ransom , I contacted Proven data to have there diagnostic.
in less than 24h they told me they could recover the data ( with a no result no fee politic )
they recovered evything in less than 4 days with constant update and follow up.
I 100% recommand them.
Thanks guys for your professionalism and kindness
